divs: Sighting Detailsmy daughters and i werw sitting out side because of hurricane katrina we had no power. my daughter said look at the shooting star i looked up and saw that it was not mooving ,just sitting there changing shapes and colors .this lasted for about 30 minutes or more .we do have this on tape.we lost sight when it droped below the trees.
Summary: lights changing shapes and colors.lights were out because of hurricane katrina so we were out side my daughters and i.
